The Details

as with most great theatre, this is a two-act production - however, unlike most great theatre, act-one has reduced capacity x

Part One

Ceremony

We are having a teeny tiny two witness ceremony (shout out Amy and Maria) at Islington Town Hall at 11:15am.

Whilst you canâ€™t join us in the ceremony, we would love for you to wait for us outside (and speculate whether we are indeed getting married), and throw flowers at us as we leave the building.

Lunch

We shall stomp together to Salut! for lunch, which we can only assume will be delicious.

Part Two

Pub

Please join us upstairs at The Alpaca from 6pm til late. Think pints, sharing platters, naff playlist, potentially a speech or two.

Schedule

11am - gather at Islington Town Hall

12pm - part one crew lunch at Salut!

6pm - pub
